item.description: Loopimation was a short workshop on building looping geometric animations in P5.js that I conducted at Processing Community Day 2020 in Bengaluru (India). Talking about historical techniques for animations You can explore some of the example starter P5.js sketches, using the wonderful p5.createLoop library. An example looping animation created in workshop Slides are available on Google Slides: You can also download & print my storyboarding template for planning your animations. More details on the Github repository for the workshop.
